BadgeDetail.Name: Working to deadlines
BadgeDetail.Description: The earner of this badge has demonstrated that they can work to deadlines. They are able to break down projects into subtasks and sequence these appropriately. They can manage and plan their own time to ensure deadlines are met. They know when to escalate and who to notify of changes or problems in a timely manner.

Task.Title: Break it down
Task.Body: Upload a plan showing how you have broken down and tackled a project.
Task.HtmlBody: Upload a plan showing how you have broken down and tackled a project.
Task.TextileBody: Upload a plan showing how you have broken down and tackled a project.
